{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient's symptoms of a tender neck, lethargy, decreased appetite, fatigue, constipation, and jaw pain, along with the biopsy results showing granulomatous inflammation and multinucleate giant cells surrounding fragmented colloid, are indicative of subacute thyroiditis.
